code:
import axios from"axios";import{LOGIN_USER,REGISTER_USER,AUTH_USER,USER_POSTING}from"./types";export function loginUser(dataToSubmit){//dataToSubmit은 LoginPage의 body(이메일, 패스워드)를 parameter로 받는 것임.
var request=axios.post("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/api/users/login"),dataToSubmit).then(function(response){return response.data;});return{type:LOGIN_USER,payload:request};}export function registerUser(dataToSubmit){var request=axios.post("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/api/users/register"),dataToSubmit).then(function(response){return response.data;});return{type:REGISTER_USER,payload:request};}export function auth(){var request=axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/api/users/auth")).then(function(response){return response.data;});return{type:AUTH_USER,payload:request};}export function userPosting(dataToSubmit){var request=axios.post("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/api/posting"),dataToSubmit).then(function(response){return response.data;});return{type:USER_POSTING,payload:request};}
